20 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_DISTRIBUTED_STORAGE_H__INCLUDED
21 #define TILEDARRAY_DISTRIBUTED_STORAGE_H__INCLUDED
22 
23 #include <TiledArray/pmap/pmap.h>
24 
25 namespace TiledArray {
26 namespace detail {
27 
29 
43 template <typename T>
44 class DistributedStorage : public madness::WorldObject<DistributedStorage<T> > {
45  public:
46  typedef DistributedStorage<T> DistributedStorage_;
47  typedef madness::WorldObject<DistributedStorage_>
48  WorldObject_;
49 
50  typedef std::size_t size_type;
51  typedef size_type key_type;
52  typedef T value_type;
53  typedef Future<value_type> future;
54  typedef Pmap pmap_interface;
55  typedef madness::ConcurrentHashMap<key_type, future>
56  container_type;
57  typedef typename container_type::accessor
58  accessor;
59  typedef typename container_type::const_accessor
60  const_accessor;
61 
62  private:
63  const size_type max_size_;
64  std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>
66  pmap_;
67  mutable container_type data_;
68  madness::AtomicInt num_live_ds_;
69 
70  // not allowed
71  DistributedStorage(const DistributedStorage_&);
72  DistributedStorage_& operator=(const DistributedStorage_&);
73 
74  future get_local(const size_type i) const {
75  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->is_local(i));
76 
77  // Return the local element.
78  const_accessor acc;
79  data_.insert(acc, i);
80  return acc->second;
81  }
82 
83  void set_handler(const size_type i, const value_type& value) {
84  future f = get_local(i);
85 
86 #ifndef NDEBUG
87  // Check that the future has not been set already.
88  if (f.probe()) TA_EXCEPTION("Tile has already been assigned.");
89 #endif // NDEBUG
90 
91  f.set(value);
92  }
93 
94  void get_handler(const size_type i, const typename future::remote_refT& ref) {
95  future f = get_local(i);
96  future remote_f(ref);
97  remote_f.set(f);
98  }
99 
100  void set_remote(const size_type i, const value_type& value) {
101  WorldObject_::task(owner(i), &DistributedStorage_::set_handler, i, value,
102  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
103  }
104 
105  struct DelayedSet : public madness::CallbackInterface {
106  private:
107  DistributedStorage_& ds_;
108  size_type index_;
109  future future_;
110 
111  public:
112  DelayedSet(DistributedStorage_& ds, size_type i, const future& f)
113  : ds_(ds), index_(i), future_(f) {
114  ++ds_.num_live_ds_;
115  }
116 
117  virtual ~DelayedSet() { --ds_.num_live_ds_; }
118 
119  virtual void notify() {
120  ds_.set_remote(index_, future_);
121  delete this;
122  }
123  }; // struct DelayedSet
124  friend struct DelayedSet;
125 
126  public:
129 
137  DistributedStorage(World& world, size_type max_size,
138  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap)
139  : WorldObject_(world),
140  max_size_(max_size),
141  pmap_(pmap),
142  data_((max_size / world.size()) + 11) {
143  // Check that the process map is appropriate for this storage object
144  TA_ASSERT(pmap_);
145  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->size() == max_size);
146  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->rank() == pmap_interface::size_type(world.rank()));
147  TA_ASSERT(pmap_->procs() == pmap_interface::size_type(world.size()));
148  num_live_ds_ = 0;
149  WorldObject_::process_pending();
150  }
151 
152  virtual ~DistributedStorage() {
153  if (num_live_ds_ != 0) {
154  madness::print_error(
155  "DistributedStorage (object id=\", id(), \") destroyed while "
156  "outstanding tasks exist. Add a fence() to extend the lifetime of "
157  "this object.");
158  abort();
159  }
160  }
161 
162  using WorldObject_::get_world;
163 
165 
168  const std::shared_ptr<pmap_interface>& pmap() const { return pmap_; }
169 
171 
173  ProcessID owner(size_type i) const {
174  TA_ASSERT(i < max_size_);
175  TA_ASSERT(pmap_);
176  return pmap_->owner(i);
177  }
178 
180 
185  bool is_local(size_type i) const {
186  TA_ASSERT(i < max_size_);
187  TA_ASSERT(pmap_);
188  return pmap_->is_local(i);
189  }
190 
192 
196  size_type size() const { return data_.size(); }
197 
199 
204  size_type max_size() const { return max_size_; }
205 
207 
212  future get(size_type i) const {
213  TA_ASSERT(i < max_size_);
214  if (is_local(i)) {
215  return get_local(i);
216  } else {
217  // Send a request to the owner of i for the element.
218  future result;
219  WorldObject_::task(owner(i), &DistributedStorage_::get_handler, i,
220  result.remote_ref(get_world()),
221  madness::TaskAttributes::hipri());
222 
223  return result;
224  }
225  }
226 
228 
234  void set(size_type i, const value_type& value) {
235  TA_ASSERT(i < max_size_);
236  if (is_local(i))
237  set_handler(i, value);
238  else
239  set_remote(i, value);
240  }
241 
243 
252  void set(size_type i, const future& f) {
253  TA_ASSERT(i < max_size_);
254  if (is_local(i)) {
255  const_accessor acc;
256  if (!data_.insert(acc, typename container_type::datumT(i, f))) {
257  // The element was already in the container, so set it with f.
258  future existing_f = acc->second;
259  acc.release();
260 
261  // Check that the future has not been set already.
262 #ifndef NDEBUG
263  if (existing_f.probe()) TA_EXCEPTION("Tile has already been assigned.");
264 #endif // NDEBUG
265  // Set the future
266  existing_f.set(f);
267  }
268  } else {
269  if (f.probe()) {
270  set_remote(i, f);
271  } else {
272  DelayedSet* set_callback = new DelayedSet(*this, i, f);
273  const_cast<future&>(f).register_callback(set_callback);
274  }
275  }
276  }
277 
278 }; // class DistributedStorage
279 
280 } // namespace detail
281 } // namespace TiledArray
282 
283 #endif // TILEDARRAY_DISTRIBUTED_STORAGE_H__INCLUDED
